channel.title: Post Modules on Room362
channel.description: Recent content in Post Modules on Room362

item.title: Run POST Modules On All Sessions
item.description: Jcran recently blogged about an easy way to run a post module on all sessions: http://blog.pentestify.com/simple-framework-domain-token-scanner msf> use post/windows/gather/enum_domain_tokens msf enum_domain_tokens> irb framework.sessions.each do |session| run_single("set SESSION #{session.first}") run_single("run") sleep 1 end You use the POST module, drop to IRB and run those 4 lines, and bam, you win. With resource files we can automate this a bit more and have it so that we do this effortlessly with any post module.
